attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: some people actually use 4x4's for what they are built for, which is not shopping. farmers need 4x4's for farming so if the 4x4 tax happens then the will be in debt because of having to pay £400 to use the 4x4's to do there job.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
